spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Yusdrayl is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Yusdrayl has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Yusdrayl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
